Timer.name: beacon
Timer.script: if sym.space.boarded then if sym.space.incombat then send('ship scan '..sym.target) end sendAll("ship details damage", "ship beacon", false) sym.shiprepair() end

Timer.name: static
Timer.script: if sym.pvp.currentstatic > 0 then sym.pvp.currentstatic = sym.pvp.currentstatic - (sym.pvp.currentstatic *.1) else disableTimer("static") end

Timer.name: frozen
Timer.script:
if sym.pvp.flags.freezestacks >= 0 then sym.pvp.flags.freezestacks = sym.pvp.flags.freezestacks - 1 cecho('

<cyan> Current Freeze Stacks\: ' ..sym.pvp.flags.freezestacks..'
') else disableTimer("frozen") end

Timer.name: ww blazing
Timer.script: if sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks > 0 then sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks = sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks - 1 cecho('\n<red> Currently Blazing\: ' ..sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks..'\n ') end

Timer.name: blazing
Timer.script: if sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks > 0 then sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks = sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks - 1 cecho('\n<red> Currently Blazing\: ' ..sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks..'\n ') end

Timer.name: burns loss
Timer.script: if sym.pvp.flags.burns > 0 then sym.pvp.flags.burns = sym.pvp.flags.burns - 1 cecho('\n<red> Currently Blazing\: ' ..sym.pvp.flags.blazingstacks..' Burns: '..sym.pvp.flags.burns) else disableTimer("burns loss") end

Timer.name: crew timer
Timer.script: if gmcp.Char.Vitals.bal == '0' then clearWindow('Crew') send('crew status', false) end
